Key Match Events: Evin Lewis scored 102 not out off 61 balls
Sri Lanka posted 156 for 3 in 23 overs
Kusal Mendis and Pathum Nissanka shared a 57-run stand for the second wicket
Sherfane Rutherford and Evin Lewis stitched together an unbeaten 88-run stand for the third wicket
Rutherford hit off-spinner Maheesh Theekshana for two sixes and a four in the 19th over
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was reduced to a 23-over affair due to a five-hour rain stoppage during the Sri Lanka innings
The West Indies suffered narrow 2-1 losses in both the ODI and preceding Twenty/20 series
The Windies will face England in the first of three ODIs on October 31, before a subsequent T20 five-match T20 series scheduled for November 9-17
